files.README.md:
# CNaught Claude Code Plugins

A monorepo of [Claude Code](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code) plugins by [CNaught](https://www.cnaught.com).

## Plugins

### Carbon Tracker (`plugins/carbon`)

Track and offset carbon emissions from your Claude Code usage

**Features:**

- Estimates carbon emissions per Claude Code session based on token usage
- Stores session data locally via SQLite
- Provides status line integration showing session carbon impact
- Includes commands for setup and reporting

## Installation

### Production (stable)

Add the marketplace and install the carbon plugin in Claude Code:

```
/plugin marketplace add CNaught-Inc/claude-code-plugins
/plugin install carbon@cnaught-plugins
```

Restart Claude Code and then run `/carbon:setup` to initialize the tracker.

### Staging (pre-release)

To install the latest staging version from the `develop` branch:

```
/plugin marketplace add CNaught-Inc/claude-code-plugins#develop
/plugin install carbon@cnaught-plugins
```

### Switching between production and staging

Remove the marketplace first, then re-add with the desired ref. Removing a marketplace automatically uninstalls its plugins.

**Production to staging:**

```
/plugin marketplace remove cnaught-plugins
/plugin marketplace add CNaught-Inc/claude-code-plugins#develop
/plugin install carbon@cnaught-plugins
```

**Staging to production:**

```
/plugin marketplace remove cnaught-plugins
/plugin marketplace add CNaught-Inc/claude-code-plugins
/plugin install carbon@cnaught-plugins
```

### Updating

To pull the latest plugin version:

```
/plugin marketplace update cnaught-plugins
```

## Development

### Prerequisites

- [Bun](https://bun.sh/) v1.3.6+
- Node.js 20+

### Setup

```bash
bun install
```

### Commands

```bash
bun run build       # Build all plugins
bun run test        # Run tests
bun run typecheck   # Type-check all plugins
bun run lint        # Lint all plugins
bun run clean       # Clean build artifacts
```

### Project Structure

```
.claude-plugin/     # Plugin marketplace metadata
plugins/
  carbon/           # Carbon tracker plugin
    src/            # Source code
    dist/           # Built output (committed via CI)
```

### Branching model

```
develop → main
```

- `main` — production releases, tagged with stable versions (e.g., `2.0.0`)
- `develop` — pre-release testing with staging versions (e.g., `2.1.0-staging.1`)

### CI

On push and pull requests, GitHub Actions will typecheck, test, and build to validate changes.

### Releasing

**Production:** Merging `develop` into `main` auto-releases by stripping the pre-release suffix from the version in `plugin.json`. A manual workflow dispatch is also available for hotfixes.

**Staging:** Trigger the "Release Staging" workflow manually with a staging version (e.g., `1.6.0-staging.1`).

### Versioning

Plugin version lives only in `plugins/<plugin>/.claude-plugin/plugin.json` (not in `marketplace.json`). The `develop` branch uses pre-release versions (e.g., `1.6.0-staging.1`) which are stripped to stable versions (e.g., `1.6.0`) on merge to `main`.
